synopsis.text:
December 24th sets the stage for a Christmas celebration with a twist, as Minamo, Hinata, Nozomi, and their friends eagerly anticipate a cosplay party. But their journey to the festivities is fraught with unexpected challenges, from a flying ship and express trains to a mysterious young girl who seems oddly familiar. Will they overcome these obstacles and make it to the party in time?

Meanwhile, four months after the events of the game that inspired the anime Wind, the gang is in the midst of planning a grand Christmas party. But the reemergence of Hikari brings about strange occurrences in the city of Kazune, leaving everyone wondering what fate has in store for them.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
